desc: Saki Shears in the worlds leading provider of hair cutting shears, hair thinners and texturizing shears. Made by hand from Japanese steels to ensure the best hair cut, every time. Saki Shears also makes unique accessories for hairdressers and barbers including straight razors, shaving products and horn combs.

layout.text: The finest cutting and thinning shears designed for the world's leading barbers and stylists. Crafted from Japanese steel resulting in the sharpest, most precise cutting.
